author: Special Correspondent
text:
A Flying Squad attached to the Tiruchi East Assembly constituency seized seven gold coins that were carried without any proper documents from an occupant of a car in the city on Wednesday.

The team was carrying out vehicle checks near Oyyamari when they stopped the car at around 7.45 a.m.

Official sources said the occupant of the vehicle Syed Ibrahim of V. Kalathur in Perambalur district had in his possession seven gold coins weighing 298 grams without any proper documents.

The gold coins were taken apparently for some transaction, the sources said and added that the team seized the coins and later deposited it in the treasury.
title: Flying Squad seizes gold coins in Tiruchi
